Judul: PROPOSED MARKETING STRATEGY TO INCREASE SALES FOR INDONESIA WIFI (WIFI.ID) AS AN INTERNET BROADBAND WIRELESS AT PT. TELEKOMUNIKASI INDONESIA IN BANDUNG
Abstrak:
The use of mobile telecommunications today is changing, data usage is the mainstay of   
 
 

cellular operators, and revenue from conversations or text messages begins to decrease.   
 
 

Telkom offers Wifi.id as a new product to serve the needs of customer data access, with   
 
 

Wireless Fidelity (Wi-Fi) technology that has advantages in data transfer speed. Data   
 
 

access over Wi-Fi is different from mobile data, requiring multiple hotspots and Wi-Fi   
 
 

Corner. There is a need for a program to increase knowledge about Wifi.id products by   
 
 

consumers in internet access through marketing proposal of Wifi.id.   
 
 

The purpose of scientific writing is to present a marketing strategy proposal to increase   
 
 

sales of Wifi.id in Bandung. Determination of marketing strategy based on SWOT analysis,   
 
 

after reviewing Wifi.id business environment either internally or externally.   
 
 

Telkom's wireless internet business in Wifi.id, externally, promises profit in the midst of   
 
 

ongoing mobile telecommunication competition. Wifi.id has a very superior infrastructure,   
 
 

as a basis for developing a marketing strategy to reach a wider customer, compared to   
 
 

competitors, which shows significant gaps. The product offered by Wifi.id mainly has the   
 
 

advantage in physical proof, with many access point or hotspot and Wi-Fi corner, so Wifi.id   
 
 

service is more accessible compared to its competitors.   
 
 

Supported by both consumer and internal analysis, then proposals for the proposed   
 
 

marketing strategy are a combination of price with product lines, and appropriate   
 
 

promotional or advertising strategies. Price based on customer analysis, for access needs   
 
 

in the short term, at a cheaper price. Company relationships with consumers are further   
 
 

enhanced through more interactive internet and social media applications.   
 
 

Keywords: brand awareness, events marketing, internet, SWOT analysis, wi-fi
Kata Kunci: brand awareness, events marketing, internet, SWOT analysis, wi-fi
